pullRequest.title: Issue# 988: Test Coverage for AtomicCountProcedure
pullRequest.bodyText:
@donraab
Hi, Don
Can you please review the pull request for issue #988?
A few questions:
(1) I don't see mockito in test project as dependency. I'm asking because my first impression is to mock a Predicate to test AtomicCountPrecedure, and I don't see mockito used anywhere in eclipse collection test cases.
(2) Is it a standard to add comments for unit test cases in the project?
Thanks!
Hong

nodes.bodyText: Hi @hongliu2020, I would expect the cast to predicate here to be unnecessary. Can you try removing it?
Same comment as above on the cast.
I would recommend inlining 0 as it will be more self explanatory.
